episodes.title: How I Left the "Cult" of Mormonism
episodes.description:
My story 🤍  How I escaped the mental indoctrination & "cult" of the Mormon church.

Resources for victims of religious trauma: https://takingbackourselves.org/resources-for-religious-abuse

Resources for LGBT+ Mormons: https://www.mormonspectrum.org/lgbt-resources

✨ VIDEOS MENTIONED ✨

Growing Up Gay & Mormon w/ @alyssadgrenfell  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-LW4dLNbeEU

Exposing Toxic Beauty Standards in the Mormon Church w/ @alyssadgrenfell https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SoERFJ8fMVU

@alyssadgrenfell Joseph Smith Series: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWDt3-Rovlw

Be sure to SUBSCRIBE to my channel to learn how to perfect your skin care routine every week! :)
